duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the development and coordination of marketing materials and deliverables in support of marketing and branding services.
Support the production of RFQs & RFPs for project pursuits and maintain accurate project-related data.
Collect, update, and maintain project information, resumes, and proposal elements.
Attend industry events, conferences, and assist in the preparation of proposal elements and marketing data.
Proficiency with Microsoft Suite (Outlook, Teams, Word, & Excel) and familiarity with the Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign, Illustrator & Photoshop).

education_certification.credential: Actively pursuing Bachelor of Arts in Marketing or closely related field preferred
